verse.verse_1: In the name of God, the Gracious, the Merciful.
verse.verse_2: Praise be to God, Lord of the Worlds.
verse.verse_3: The Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
verse.verse_4: Master of the Day of Judgment.
verse.verse_5: It is You we worship, and upon You we call for help.
verse.verse_6: Guide us to the straight path.
verse.verse_7: The path of those You have blessed, not of those against whom there is anger, nor of those who are misguided.
